content: कुतूहल {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Wonderful. {@--2@} Excellent, best. {@--3@} Praised, celebrated. --लं {@--1@} Desire, curiosity; उज्झितशब्देन जनितं नः कुतूहलं <ls>Ś. 1</ls>; यदि विलासकलासु कुतूहलं <ls>Gīt. 1</ls>; (पपौ) कुतूहलेनेव मनुष्यशोणितम् <ls>R. 3. 54</ls>; <ls n="R.">13. 21</ls>; <ls n="R.">15. 65.</ls> {@--2@} Eagerness. {@--3@} What excites curiosity, anything pleasing or interesting, a curiosity. {@--4@} Delight, pleasure; <ls>U. 1. 20.</ls>
